an10.175:1.1: “Saparikkamano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano.
an10.175:1.2: Kathañca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano?
an10.175:1.3: Pāṇātipātissa, bhikkhave, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.4: Adinnādāyissa, bhikkhave, adinnādānā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.5: Kāmesumicchācārissa, bhikkhave, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.6: Musāvādissa, bhikkhave, musāvādā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.7: Pisuṇavācassa, bhikkhave, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.8: Pharusavācassa, bhikkhave, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.9: Samphappalāpissa, bhikkhave, samphappalāpā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:1.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano”ti.
